RuleSet.Name: src/schema/buff/SchemaBuffTableH.java
RuleSet.Descr: Java 21 implementation of a $TableName$ history buffer object

GenFile.Name: fileSchemaBuffTableHJava
GenFile.BasePackageName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$/src/main/java
GenFile.SubPackageName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$.buff

RuleSet.GenRule: extends $reference SuperClassRelation reference ToTable DefSchemaName$Buff$reference SuperClassRelation reference ToTable TableName$H implements I$DefSchemaName$$TableName$H
$switch HasSuperClassRelation no implHBuffColumnOptAuditGetterSetters default empty$$iterate Columns( each implColumnGetterSetter )$
$reference SuperClassRelation reference ToTable implHBuffCompareHierarchy$$iterate DataColumns( each implCompareToAttr empty empty )$
$reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( each implBuffSetCopyPKeyCol )$
super.set$reference SuperClassRelation reference ToTable TableName$Buff( src );
